Review Title: A quiet place within Victoria Island
Review Text: Fryburgh is a small hotel, it looks like a residential house converted to a hotel. It is a small place with little or few amenities. The room is not that big but moderate, the furnitures are old but maintained. The hotel is situated in a serene environment within Victoria Island. The staff are very courteous, thanks to Roseline, the receptionist who helped to book a taxi for using her handset.

We had a couples dinner in the cool and beautiful ambience of nature while afterwards the room was arranged like we were on honeymoon awaiting our entrance! Really courteous staff and well mannered, good chef as the food was superb!!!! Very nice place to visit in the heart of Victoria Island in Lagos!!!

This hotel is a small boutique hotel with a very welcoming settings. The set up is very endearing and staff are well mannered. it feels like home away from home.oh! how can i forget to mention the 411 lounge situated with the hotel! World class set up and food.  I love it and will surely be back. I recommend this hotel for all travelers who desires comfort at a pocket friendly rate
